ht32f5xxxx_i2s.c File Reference

This file provides all the I2S firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_i2s.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define I2S_EN   (1UL)
#define MCLK_OP_EN   (1UL << 9)
#define TX_MUTE_EN   (1UL << 12)
#define CLK_DIV_EN   (1UL << 15)
#define BCLK_INV_EN   (1UL << 18)
#define MCLK_INV_EN   (1UL << 19)
#define I2S_SLAVE   (1UL << 3)

Functions

void I2S_DeInit (void)
 Deinitialize the I2S peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void I2S_Init (I2S_InitTypeDef *I2S_InitStruct)
 Initialize the I2S peripheral according to the specified parameters in the I2S_InitStruct.
void I2S_Cmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the I2S peripheral.
void I2S_TxMuteCmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the Tx mute for the I2S peripheral.
void I2S_PDMACmd (u32 I2S_PDMAREQ, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the I2S PDMA interface.
void I2S_FIFOReset (u32 I2S_FIFO)
 Reset the specified I2S FIFO.
void I2S_FIFOTrigLevelConfig (u32 I2S_FIFO, u32 I2S_FIFOLevel)
 Set the trigger level of specified I2S FIFO.
u8 I2S_GetFIFOStatus (u32 I2S_FIFO)
 Return the status of specified I2S FIFO.
void I2S_IntConfig (u32 I2S_Int, ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the I2S interrupt.
FlagStatus I2S_GetFlagStatus (u32 I2S_Flag)
 Check whether the specified I2S flag has been set or not.
void I2S_ClearFlag (u32 I2S_Flag)
 Clear the specified I2S flag.

Detailed Description

This file provides all the I2S firmware functions.
